document_data.name: Enchant Phylactery
document_data.mainbody: '''''Enchant phylactery''''' was a [[divine magic|divine]] [[enchantment]] [[spell]] from the [[guardian sphere|guardian]] and [[protection sphere]]s that placed another spell upon a [[phylactery]] that was triggered when it was opened.
document_data.Effects: If attuned to a specific individual, as was the case with a [[lich]], the individual would not be injured by any harmful spells placed upon the phylactery if they opened it. The desired spell to be placed upon the phylactery needed to be cast by the caster of ''enchant phylactery'' immediately upon casting the spell.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as [[material component]]s a strand of [[spider]] web and one of the caster's eyelashes and fingernail clippings to cast.
document_data.History: The ''[[Scepter of Mystra]]'', a relic of the [[Mystra]]n faith, could cast the ''enchant phylactery'' spell.{{cite book/Prayers from the Faithful|77-80}}
